This
Privacy Policy outlines our practices concerning the handling of any personal
data that might be collected or processed during the use of our service.

Data Collection and Usage

Our service does not store, log, or collect any personal data from its users.

Hosting Platform

Our service is hosted on Netlify, which may collect data for operational and
security purposes.

We do not control and are not responsible for the data
collection practices of Netlify.

For details on their data collection and
processing, please refer to [Netlify's Privacy
Policy](https://www.netlify.com/privacy/).
